refnamediv.refpurpose: Load a graphic user interface from a saved file

listitem.para: character string containing the path of the file

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para:
The loadGui function can be used to load in the Scilab session a graphic user interface previously saved in a file with the
saveGui
function.
loadGui(filename) loads an interface saved in file given by its path filename.
